entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOP America is still waiting for Trump to address the Nation and speak about his lack of response on the Coronavirus, the 100k dead Americans, 40 million now jobless and his Zero testing strategy. Instead, the WH porch lights are off and Trump is cowering in the PEOC. #UnfitForOffice
